boolean.name: isSelectionOnDisplayPlannedTime
boolean.title: Selection on display planned time
boolean.help: By activating this option, the user will only be able to enter a planned time from this selection. Be careful to define the associated values. If the configuration is not activated, no constraints will be applied to the time.
